description: This Java source file defines a REST controller class 'ConvertController' that provides HTTP endpoints for initiating a conversion process and retrieving the resulting graph data. It handles HTTP POST requests to start conversions and GET requests to fetch conversion results by job ID, integrating with service classes for processing.

classes.name: ConvertController
classes.description: REST controller managing conversion requests and retrieval of graph results for a wiki content to graph conversion process.

methods.name: convert
methods.description: Handles POST requests to initiate a conversion process, validates input, and returns a job ID or error response.

methods.name: getGraph
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve the conversion result associated with a specific job ID, manages job status checks and error handling.
